name: None Left Behind
description:
Can you protect the comrades who fought alongside you? Come fight for the lives of your friends, in this Ludum Dare 46 Entry!

The web version can take a little bit of time to load.  If you are not able to play it through that version, a Windows Executable version is available as well. Have Fun!

Art and Programming by PirhanaLab

Music  and SFX by RyanAvx
